articles.title: Nigeria : Inflation Worsening Diabetes Crisis in Nigeria - Study
articles.summary: The study compared the average household income with the annual cost of diabetes management, revealing that only people earning above N2.5 million per year can afford consistent treatment without falling into debt A new study has shown that inflation and rising living costs have severely affected access to essential diabetes medication in Nigeria, pushing many patients into financial hardship and worsening health outcomes. articles.summary: Could it be the start of a new era for Berkshire Hathaway before Warren Buffett even vacates the CEO chair? articles.title: Bitcoin sinks to six - month low as risk - off sentiment persists
articles.summary: Bitcoin dropped to its lowest level in six months on Friday, as a broad sell-off in risk assets deepened amid fading hopes that the Federal Reserve will cut U.S. interest rates at its upcoming policy meeting. Selling in U.S. equities, however, eased slightly in the afternoon ahead of the weekend, but investors stayed on edge as they braced for a slew of economic data next week following the governmentâ€™s reopening after a record 43-day shutdown. â€œ
